JUSTICE ASHOK MENON WEDNESDAY, THE O8TH DAY OF JANUARY 2020 / 18TH POUSHA, 1941 Cr1.MC.No.8915 OF 2019(D) AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN SC 155/2019 OF ADDITIONAL DISTRICT COURT & SESSIONS COURT - III, PALAKKAD CRIME NO.603/2018 OF Malampuzha Police Station , Palakkad PETITIONERS/ACCUSED 1 TO 7: 1 SURESH, AGED 32 YEARS S/O.SIVARAMAN, THADTIKKANMARE HOUSE, EZHAKKADU P.O., MUNDUR, PALAKKAD, PIN-678600. 2 KIRAN, AGED 30 YEARS S/O.KRISHNAN, KUNDUMARIKKALPURA HOUSE, KANHTRAKKADAVU, MALAMPUZHA P.O., PALAKKAD, PIN- 678651. 3 JINU, AGED 25 YEARS S/O.RAGHAVAN, KANHIRAKKADAVU, MALAMPUZHA P.O., PALAKKAD, PIN-678651. 4 LINESH, AGED 29 YEARS S/O.RAMACHANDRAN, PANGICHANPURA HOUSE, KADUKKAMKUNNAM POST, PALAKKAD DISTRICT, PIN-678651. 5 ABHILASH, AGED 23 YEARS S/O.BALAN, MAMPULLIKUNNU HOUSE, VELIKKADU P.O., MUNDUR, PALAKKAD DISTRICT, PIN-678592. 6 VINU RAGHAVAN, AGED 29 YEARS S/O.RAGHAVAN, KANHIRAKKADAVU, MALAMPUZHA P.O., PALAKKAD, PIN-678651. 7 PRANAB @ PAPPU, AGED 23 YEARS S/O.RAJAMANI, MANGALASSERY HOUSE, KADUKKAMKUNNAM P.O., MALAMPUZHA, PALAKKAD DISTRICT, PIN-678651. BY ADV. SRI.RAJESH SIVARAMANKUTTY Ee maar ea rte Ee 5 ie 2020/KER/839 Crl.MC 8915/2019 -~2- RESPONDENTS /STATE AND DEFACTO COMPLAINANT AND VICTIM: 1 THE STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM, PIN-678031. 2 HAMSA AGED 50 YEARS S/O.KOYAMU, THOTTIKULAYAN HOUSE, PERINJOLAM, MANNARKKADU, PALAKKAD DISTRICT, PIN-678582. 3 SAINU @ SAINUDHEEN AGED 48 YEARS S/O.MUHAMMED, PULLATH HOUSE, NARANGAPATTA, MANNARKKAD, PALAKKAD DISTRICT, PIN-678582. R2-3 BY ADV. K.V. ANTONY OTHER PRESENT: SRI.C.S.HRITHWIK. SR.PP THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 08.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: = op 2020/KER/839 Crl.MC 8915/2019 -3- ORDER Dated this the 8th day of January 2020 Petitioners are accused 1 to 7 in SC No.155/2019 on the files of the IIIrd Additional Sessions Court, Palakkad for having allegedly committed offences punishable under Sections 364(A), 394, 395 and 506Cii) IPC. 2. The defacto complainant and the aggrieved are respondents 2 and 3. They have appeared through counsel and filed affidavits to the effect that the matter has been amicably settled with the petitioners and that they do not have any grievance against them. A report to that effect has also been obtained from the investigating officer through the learned Senior Public Prosecutor. The petitioners do not have any criminal antecedents. No public interest 15s involved. In the result, the Criminal M.C. is allowed and the entire proceedings as against the petitioners herein in SC No.155/2019 on the files of the ItIIrd Biipias el ie 5 ie 2020/KER/839 Crl.MC 8915/2019 -4- Additional Sessions Court, Palakkad shall stand quashed under Section 482 Cr.PC and the petitioners/accused are discharged. Sd/- ASHOK MENON JUDGE Ig Ee maar ea rte Ee 5 ie 2020/KER/839 Crl.MC 8915/2019 -5- APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE A CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FIR IN CRIME NO.603/2018 OF MALAMPUZHA POLICE STATION, PALAKKAD. ANNEXURE B CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT IN S.C.NO.155/2019 ON THE FILES OF IIIRD ADDITIONAL SESSIONS COURT, PALAKKAD. ANNEXURE C COPY OF THE AFFIDAVIT FILED BY 2ND RESPONDENT DATED 31ST DAY OF JULY, 2019. ANNEXURE D COPY OF THE AFFIDAVIT SWORN TO BY THE 3RD RESPONDENT DATED 31.7.2019.
